refnamediv.refpurpose: creates a BRL-CAD geometry database from C code

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: wdb_example creates a BRL-CAD geometry database from C code. This database contains a sphere centered at 0,0,0; an rpp under it; and a union of both objects.
Note that this is for writing a database and not modifying it. Currently, there is no API for modifying the database. Also note that the values in the database are stored in millimeters.

refsect1.title: BUG REPORTS
